name: 2fauth
tagline: A self-hosted web application for managing and generating multi-device two-factor auth codes
description: 2FAuth is an open-source, self-hosted web application built to manage your two-factor authentication (2FA) accounts and generate their security codes (TOTP/HOTP and Steam Guard). It supports features like adding accounts via QR code or manually, organising accounts into groups, encryption of sensitive data, auto-logout on inactivity, and single-user usage. It's designed for both mobile and desktop access, giving you an alternative to smartphone-only apps like Google Authenticatorâ€”so you can run 2FAuth on your own server, backup your database, and avoid relying solely on a mobile device.

features.title: Multi-Device Sync
